review: super convenienttry turning on CEC from the features on your tv- whenever you cast the tv turns on and goes to the chromecast sourceBUTi wouldn't recommend casting from a laptop- the quality is much lower, with a lot of stuttercasting from a phone is completely smooth

review: So far works great.  Use it with my Nexus 7  tablet and Asus Zenfone 2.  Living overseas it is my main way to show streaming and downloaded movies on to my big screen TV.  For the price this baby is a definite buy!!
